About Syed Bokhari

Registered Behaviour Support Practitioner

Professional Background

Evidence-Based Support for Meaningful Change

I am a Registered Behaviour Support Practitioner dedicated to enhancing the quality of life for NDIS participants through Positive Behaviour Support (PBS). My practice focuses on understanding the "why" behind behaviours to create environments where individuals can thrive.

Registered with NDIS Quality & Safeguards Commission

My Practice Philosophy

Grounding every intervention in human rights and clinical evidence.

Person-Centred

Evidence-Based

Compliance & Clinical Governance

Professionalism and safety are paramount. My practice is aligned with the NDIS Capability Framework, ensuring that all Behaviour Support Plans meet the highest regulatory standards.

üìù Practitioner Note: As a Registered Practitioner, I engage in regular clinical supervision and multidisciplinary collaboration. All services involving regulated restrictive practices are developed with strict adherence to State/Territory authorization requirements and NDIS Commission reporting obligations.
